title: Curecanti National Recreation Area: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Curecanti National Recreation Area is open 24 hours per day, 365 days per year, weather permitting.  Seasonal Road Closures East Portal Road is closed in winter. The road typically closes mid-November and reopens mid-April.  Watercraft Inspections & LaunchingRead More Visitor CentersRead More
